bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of li ji 痢疾 , free-flux illness, with one’s defecation difficult to control and carrying much white and less red mucous matter. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 15: 駐車丸，治大冷洞 痢腸滑，下赤白如魚腦，日夜無度，腹痛不可忍者方 , “The ‘Pills that bring a carriage to a halt’ are a recipe to cure throughflux free-flux illness with massive cold and intestinal smoothness, a discharge of red and white matter resembling fish brain, occurring countless times during day and night, and going along with unbearable abdominal pain”.
